professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in database migrations, performance tuning, and high-availability solutions using Golden Gate and Data Guard. Skilled in cloud migrations and proficient with tools like TOAD, Commvault, Idera, Jira, OEM, Azure, and SolarWinds.

key_responsibilities: Performed Oracle database migrations and upgrades from on-premises to cloud environments.
Optimized database performance by resolving memory issues and tuning SGA/PGA settings.
Configured Golden Gate for unidirectional replication and ensured data synchronization.
